name: Volunteers of America of Kentucky INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Volunteers of America of Kentucky INC is a Voluntary or Charitable provider based in New Albany, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $11.6M in Medicaid payments across 7K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $11.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
